title: 1 Bedroom 1 Bath! 1799! Wonderful Space! Washer/Dryer in unit.
posting_body: 16 Penn
16 Penn Apartments are located in the northern central portion of Colorado and provide the standard you have been seeking in an apartment community.
Experience the richness of Denver’s trendy cultural scene.
Embark on modern, vintage, and eclectic shopping and dining adventures, visit the Denver Zoo, or catch a game at Mile High Stadium.
There is something for every lifestyle in our walkable neighborhood in the heart of Denver.
Step inside your new one or two bedroom apartment home and discover premium amenities that will exceed expectations.
Explore your gourmet kitchen with all the modern conveniences, including a dishwasher.
You will be amazed at all the extra storage space and huge walk-in closets!
Each residence is equipped with central air and heating, hardwood floors, and a washer and dryer.
Imagine taking in the city views on your personal balcony after a long day.
The community amenities abound with a modern clubhouse, housekeeping services, a picnic area with barbecue, and a state-of-the-art fitness center.
Our professional team provides on-call and on-site maintenance, 24-hour courtesy patrol, and there is a business center with copy and fax services for your convenience.
We are also a pet-friendly environment with a dog run and free pet treats!
There is so much to enjoy at 16 Penn Apartments, and we can’t wait to give you a personal tour.
Contact us for an appointment and come to see why we are the best choice for quality apartment homes in Denver, CO.
